content: side place one additional single_crochet in the corner edge 4- continue around with 10 single_crochet along the last edge place one additional single_crochet in the corner then slip_stitch into your original stitch 11 stitches on this edge you should have 36 stitches in this first round r2 blo 36 single_crochet r3 r6* 36 single_crochet *your very last stitch in row 6 will be a slip_stitch instead of single_crochet this will help give the piece a flatter bottom next you will make the top edge of the dumpster fire turn your piece so that the grey top is facing up go back and single_crochet along the flo that is exposed in the first loop around close that round with a slip_stitch use a tapestry needle and pull the tails to the inside of the piece attach pieces to the main body -be sure the flames are attached to the top grey portion -sew one arm on to each side they can be placed on the front corners between the 2nd and 3rd row from the top tie the ends on the inside of the work - place the eyes between the second and third row from the top with about 5 stitches between them -using the tapestry needle sew a mouth with the embroidery floss or yarn once all of your pieces are attached line up the bottom and sew it on the underside of the piece using the tail on the green bottom piece once it is sewn on about ¾ of the way add your stuffing continue sewing the rest and hide your tail create a sign by printing the attached template or draw one by hand attach the sign to a toothpick then with a small drop of hot glue place it in the hand and glue it to the body your piece is now complete and everything is fine emotional support emotional support dumpster fire dumpster fire it s fine it s fine i m fine i m fine everything is fine everything is fine emotional support emotional support dumpster fire dumpster fire it s fine it s fine i m fine i m fine everything is fine everything is fine emotional support emotional support dumpster fire dumpster fire it s fine it s fine i m fine i m fine everything is fine everything is fine emotional support emotional support dumpster fire dumpster fire it s fine it s fine i m fine i m fine everything is fine everything is fine emotional support emotional support dumpster fire dumpster fire it s fine it s fine i m fine i m fine everything is fine everything is fine emotional support emotional support dumpster fire dumpster fire it s fine it s fine i m fine i m fine everything is fine everything is fine
